name: Exchanging Vowels Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
(Words that link the two definitions are capitalised, and both words have the same number of letters.)

Slim king of the jungle.
Sugary plant root in small water craft.
Fuel from a bog inspires sonnet writer.
One who tells an untruth about animal's den.
Upper-range male voice adjusts to correct pitch.
Matching set of clothes have somewhere to sit.
Theft of backless and armless seat.
Greek god of love finds metal minerals.
